FuncDef: The display ospfv3 error command displays OSPFv3 errors. The display ospfv3 error command displays OSPFv3 errors. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an OSPFv3 process ID. If no process ID is specified, errors of all OSPFv3 processes are displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Examples: 0          : Packet size > ipv6 length     0          : Invalid Source Address
